title: Unit Converter (Android Wear)
summary: Convert values from one unit to another right on your wrist

descriptionHTML:
The best unit converter for android just happens to be for your wrist! No need to bring out your phone or reach for a computer, Unit Converter for Android Wear lets you convert values from one unit to another right on your smart watch.

The following categories and units are supported:

acceleration
- foot/sec²
- mile/hour second
- free fall
- meter/sec²
- mile/sec²
- millimeter/sec²
- centimeter/sec²

temperature
- Fahrenheit
- Kelvin
- Celsius
- Rankin

comments: A marvelous application. I would change the way units are chosen (I'd use a dropdown list instead of current selector for easier selection of the needed option), but otherwise it's great.  And don't read that review saying the app isn't installed on the device -- this is a glitch of Android Wear and not of the app itself.
Great app! I guess the only thing I wish it had was the ability to enable/disable certain units/categories.
Should have a way to set favorites or at least remember the last unit you needed to convert without scrolling through every unit every time.
Very great app. It will convert almost any unit you can think of.
Looks good but can't use it Does not show up on my apps in android wear
